Package com.project.alertapp.services

Class AlertsService

java.lang.Object
com.project.alertapp.services.AlertsService
@Service public class AlertsService extends Object
AlertsService provides receive, update and delete alerts.
Author:
KaanSarigul

    Method

    void
    alertChecker​(List<Alerts> alertsList, BigDecimal stockCurrentPrice)
    This method takes a list of alerts belonging to a stock and compares it with the current price of the stock and triggers the alert as a result of this comparison.

  • Constructor Details

    • AlertsService

      public AlertsService()

  • Method Details

    • getAllAlerts

      public List<Alerts> getAllAlerts​(Long userId, Optional<String> stockSymbol)
      This method checks the userId and StockSymbol and returns all appropriate alerts. If stockSymbol is not present then it search undeleted alerts by userId.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      stockSymbol - StockSymbol is unique key for stocks. It can be null.
      Returns:
      Returns all undeleted alerts belongs to a user. If stockSymbol exists, then returns alerts belongs one stock.

    • saveOneAlert

      public Alerts saveOneAlert​(Alerts newAlert)
      This method provides to create a new alert for the user.
      Parameters:
      newAlert - It contains alert details.The details cannot be null.
      Returns:
      Returns saved alert.

    • getOneAlert

      public Alerts getOneAlert​(Long userId, Long alertId)
      This method retrieve an alert of the user.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      alertId - Id of requested alert.
      Returns:
      Returns one alert belongs the specified user.

    • deleteAlert

      public void deleteAlert​(Long userId, Long alertId)
      This method delete an alert completely.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      alertId - Id of requested alert.

    • softDeleteAlert

      public Alerts softDeleteAlert​(Long userId, Long alertId, SoftDeleteRequest deleteRequest)
      This method changes deleted property of the alert. It means soft delete an alert.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      alertId - Id of requested alert.
      deleteRequest - It contains deleted property which will change alert's deleted property.
      Returns:
      Returns updated alert.

    • updateAlert

      public Alerts updateAlert​(Long userId, Long alertId, UpdateAlertRequest updateAlertRequest)
      This method changes alert properties using by updateAlertRequest object.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      alertId - Id of requested alert.
      updateAlertRequest - It contains new alert properties.
      Returns:
      Returns updated alert.

    • stockControl

      public void stockControl​(List<StockSymbolAndPrice> stockPriceList)
      This method sends the current stock price and stockSymbol of all stocks to the alertChecker method to check one by one.
      Parameters:
      stockPriceList - It contains StockSymbolAndPrice object, that object contains StockSymbol and stocks current price.

    • alertChecker

      public void alertChecker​(List<Alerts> alertsList, BigDecimal stockCurrentPrice)
      This method takes a list of alerts belonging to a stock and compares it with the current price of the stock and triggers the alert as a result of this comparison.
      Parameters:
      alertsList - List of alarms belonging to a stock.
      stockCurrentPrice - Current value of stock.
